constantValues: Specific types of payments (such as in-kind gifts, stock, and securities) that are classified as assets require nonprofits to follow specific reporting rules.  Managing these gifts tends to be very manual work for the development-operations staff of nonprofit organizations.  These gifts come in through a bank and must be manually reviewed and entered into a batch.  Often questions must be answered before a gift entry can be completed with ease.

definitions.description: Specific types of payments (such as in-kind gifts, stock, and securities) that are classified as assets require nonprofits to follow specific reporting rules.  Managing these gifts tends to be very manual work for the development-operations staff of nonprofit organizations.  These gifts come in through a bank and must be manually reviewed and entered into a batch.  Often questions must be answered before a gift entry can be completed with ease.
